Name: Papillon Zeugma Relaxury
Description: This exclusive beach hotel is located directly on the beach. Belek is about 5 kms away. There is a minibus that runs twice a day to Antalya and once a day to Side. The airport is 35 kms away. Opened in 2002, this hotel includes a total of 338 rooms. Each of them is tastefully furnished with modern amenities and Internet access. The hotel offers access to various shops, a bar, a nightclub, an auditorium, a games room, an air-conditioned main restaurant with non-smoking area, and a number of à la carte restaurants. Additionally, a conference room, a public Internet terminal, car park, playground and a kid's club are available. The hotel has two swimming pools with a children's pools, sauna, hammam and a gym. It also offers various water sports. Guests can join the aerobics and archery classes.

Facilities.Name: All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
All inclusive with alcoholic drinks top brands
